member.name: T:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql
member.summary: Container containing global constants.
MySql functions container.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.MYSQL_CLIENT_COMPRESS
member.summary: Use compression protocol.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.MYSQL_CLIENT_IGNORE_SPACE
member.summary: Allow space after function names. Not supported (ignored).

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.MYSQL_CLIENT_INTERACTIVE
member.summary: Allow interactive_timeout seconds (instead of wait_timeout) of inactivity before closing the connection. Not supported (ignored).

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.MYSQL_CLIENT_SSL
member.summary: Use SSL encryption.

member.summary: Add items keyed by column names.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.MYSQL_NUM
member.summary: Add items keyed by column indices.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.MYSQL_BOTH
member.summary: Add both items keyed by column names and items keyd by column indices.

member.name: T:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.ConnectFlags
member.summary: Connection flags.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.ConnectFlags.None
member.summary: No flags.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.ConnectFlags.Compress
member.summary: Use compression protocol.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.ConnectFlags.IgnoreSpace
member.summary: Allow space after function names. Not supported (ignored).

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.ConnectFlags.Interactive
member.summary: Allow interactive_timeout seconds (instead of wait_timeout) of inactivity before closing the connection. Not supported (ignored).

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.ConnectFlags.SSL
member.summary: Use SSL encryption.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.ConnectFlags.Pooling
member.summary: Whether to enable polling on the connection string.

member.summary: Query result array format.

member.summary: Add items keyed by column names.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.QueryResultKeys.Numbers
member.summary: Add items keyed by column indices.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.QueryResultKeys.Both
member.summary: Add both items keyed by column names and items keyd by column indices.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.LastConnection(Pchp.Core.Context)
member.summary: Gets last active connection.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.mysql_close(Pchp.Core.Context,Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Closes the non-persistent connection to the MySQL server that's associated with the specified link identifier. If link_identifier isn't specified, the last opened link is used.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.mysql_connect(Pchp.Core.Context,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.ConnectFlags)
member.summary: Open a connection to a MySQL Server.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.mysql_pconnect(Pchp.Core.Context,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.ConnectFlags)
member.summary: Establishes a connection to MySQL server using a specified server, user, password, and flags.
member.returns: Resource representing the connection or a null reference (false in PHP) on failure.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.mysql_query(Pchp.Core.Context,Pchp.Core.PhpString,Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Sends a query to the current database associated with a specified connection.
member.returns: Query resource or a null reference (null in PHP) on failure.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.QueryBinary(System.Text.Encoding,System.Byte[],Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySqlConnectionResource)
member.summary: Sends a query to the current database associated with a specified connection. Preserves binary characters.
member.returns: Query resource or a null reference (null in PHP) on failure.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.UnescapeString(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Inverse function to .
member.param: Source byte array containing escaped characters.
Index of the first character to start unescaping with.
Target byte array where unescaped is copied.
member.remarks: This method unescapes as many characters as can hold.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.mysql_insert_id(Pchp.Core.Context,Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Gets id generated by the previous insert operation.
member.returns: Id or 0 if the last command wasn't an insertion.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.mysql_thread_id(Pchp.Core.Context,Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Gets the current DB thread's id.
member.returns: The thread id.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.mysql_fetch_row(Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Get a result row as an integer indexed array.
member.returns: Array indexed by integers starting from 0 containing values of the current row.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.mysql_fetch_assoc(Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Get a result row as an associative array.
member.returns: Array indexed by column names containing values of the current row.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.mysql_fetch_array(Pchp.Core.PhpResource,Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.QueryResultKeys)
member.summary: Get a result row as an array with a specified key format.
member.param: Type(s) of keys in the resulting array.
member.returns: Array containing values of the rows indexed by column keys and/or column indices depending on value of .

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.mysql_fetch_object(Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Get a result row as an object.
member.returns: Object whose fields contain values from the current row. Field names corresponds to the column names.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.mysql_affected_rows(Pchp.Core.Context,Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Get a number of affected rows in the previous operation.
member.returns: The number of affected rows or -1 if the last operation failed or the connection is invalid.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.mysql_num_fields(Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Get number of columns (fields) in a specified result.
member.returns: Number of columns in the specified result or 0 if the result resource is invalid.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.mysql_num_rows(Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Get number of rows in a specified result.
member.returns: Number of rows in the specified result or 0 if the result resource is invalid.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.mysql_free_result(Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Releases a resource represening a query result.
member.returns: true on success, false on failure (invalid resource).

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.mysql_select_db(Pchp.Core.Context,System.String,Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Selects the current DB for a specified connection.
member.returns: true on success, false on failure.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.mysql_error(Pchp.Core.Context,Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Returns the text of the error message from previous operation.
member.returns: Error message, empty string if no error occured, or a null reference if the connection resource is invalid.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.mysql_errno(Pchp.Core.Context,Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Returns the number of the error from previous operation.
member.returns: Error number, 0 if no error occured, or -1 if the number cannot be retrieved.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.mysql_result(Pchp.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32,Pchp.Core.PhpValue)
member.summary: Gets a contents of a specified cell from a specified query result resource.
member.param: Column (field) integer index or string name.
member.returns: The value of the cell or a null reference (false in PHP) on failure (invalid resource or row/field index/name).
member.remarks: Result is affected by run-time quoting.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.mysql_field_name(Pchp.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a name of a specified column (field) in a result.
member.returns: Name of the column or a null reference on failure (invalid resource or column index).

member.summary: Gets a type of a specified column (field) in a result.
member.returns: MySQL type translated to PHP terminology.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySql.mysql_field_len(Pchp.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a length of a specified column (field) in a result.
member.returns: Length of the column or a -1 on failure (invalid resource or column index).

member.summary: Sets the result resource's current column (field) offset.

member.summary: Sets the result resource's current row index.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySqli.Constants.MYSQLI_CLIENT_SSL
member.summary: Use SSL (encrypted protocol). This option should not be set by application programs; it is set internally in the MySQL client library

member.summary: Use compression protocol.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySqli.Constants.MYSQLI_CLIENT_INTERACTIVE
member.summary: Allow interactive_timeout seconds (instead of wait_timeout seconds) of inactivity before closing the connection. The client's session wait_timeout variable will be set to the value of the session interactive_timeout variable.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySqli.Constants.MYSQLI_CLIENT_IGNORE_SPACE
member.summary: Allow spaces after function names. Makes all functions names reserved words.

member.summary: For using buffered resultsets.

member.summary: For using unbuffered resultsets.

member.summary: Add items keyed by column names.

member.summary: Add items keyed by column indices.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MySql.MySqli.Constants.MYSQLI_BOTH
member.summary: Add both items keyed by column names and items keyd by column indices.
